RouteTransformerPluginBean - Class in com.amalto.core.plugin.base.route.ejb
Route Item Plugin Plugin name: route Description The Route plugin submits an item to subscription engine

This plugin is usually used after the Project Item plugin which outputs a Primary Key Inputs item_primary_key: the primary key of the item to route as an object of type application/xtentis.itempk Outputs item_primary_key: the primary key of the item routed as an object of type application/xtentis.itempk Parameters There are no parameters for this plugin.
